title: Ep. 48. The Eleventh Hour - Chapter Eight
description: Could you resist the power to go back and change your very worst mistake? What if it meant unraveling some of the non-mistakes you've made since? Also: Imagine, for the sake of this hypothetical, that you're a complete goober. Merle runs out for smokes. Taako takes the show on the road. Magnus goes home.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
